Metro­politan Man Cameo

Published on April 20, 2017

I have a bit part playing the lead juror in Chapter 13: A Vast and Terryifying Enemy: part 2 of the audio production of The Metropolitan Man, produced by Eneasz Brodski. The story is originally written by Alexander Wales, and can be found on fanfiction.net. This rationalist fiction wonders what might be going through the mind of Lex Luthor in the Metropolis Universe. This would be interesting on its own, even if Lex were not a compelling rationalist figure, who invites the reader to consider whether they ought to feel morally compelled to pursue a course of action marking them as a ‘super-villan’.
